mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_writer, inquiry_password, inquiry_secret, inquiry_regdate, inquiry_email ) values (#{inquiry_title}, #{inquiry_content}, #{inquiry_writer}, #{inquiry_password}, 'y', now(), #{inquiry_email})
mapper.select: select inquiry_num, inquiry_title, inquiry_writer, inquiry_secret, inquiry_regdate, inquiry_state from inquiry order by inquiry_num DESC
select IF(COUNT(*) = 1, true, false) from inquiry where inquiry_num = #{inquiry_num} and inquiry_password = #{inquiry_password}
